subject: update to junit 4
msgSnippet: Hi all, i just wanted to upgrade from junit 3.8.1 to junit 4.0 or 4.1. I m missing two things: - organizing my testcases in testsuits (i.e. in nested folders)
messageBody:
Hi all,

i just wanted to upgrade from junit 3.8.1 to junit 4.0 or 4.1.
I'm missing two things:
- organizing my testcases in testsuits (i.e. in nested folders)
- running the testcases in a Swing-GUI

what can i do?
or is there any surrogate for this>?

greetings


ernst
